mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS PROJECT_ID , A.APPLICANT_ID , C.EMAIL , A.AMOUNT , A.PERIOD FROM PROJECT_APPLICANTS A JOIN APPLICANT B ON B.ID = A.APPLICANT_ID JOIN MEMBER C ON C.ID = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.ID = #{id}

SELECT A.ID AS PROJECT_ID , A.NAME , A.AMOUNT , A.PERIOD , A.DEADLINE , A.CONTENT , B.APPLICANT_ID , B.AMOUNT AS ORDER_AMOUNT , B.PERIOD AS EXECUTION_PERIOD , B.CONTENT AS SUPPORT_CONTENT , D.EMAIL FROM PROJECT A JOIN PROJECT_APPLICANTS B ON B.ID = A.ID JOIN APPLICANT C ON C.ID = B.APPLICANT_ID JOIN MEMBER D ON D.ID = C.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.ID = #{projectId} AND B.APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId}
